channel.title: { Viresh Gupta }
channel.description: Web Space of Viresh Gupta. Tech Enthusiast. Geek Stuff and Projects ;)

item.title: StockD
item.description:
Yet another NSE EOD data downloader.
Downloads and processes EOD bhavcopy files directly from NSE server and converts it in a format that can be easily loaded directly into many popular charting softwares such as MetaStock, Amibroker etc.

item.title: ArxInsania
item.description:
Game Brief:
“You are an explorer on a quest to find the mythical Sanjeevni Booti scattered across undulated and mountainous terrains – with lush green plateaus, snow-capped mountains, shady forests and much more. However, nature is not in your favour, with giant pumpkins falling from the sky, threatening to crush you on impact. You need to make your way through 5 levels, with each level containing 5 Sanjeevni Booti to be collected, which are hidden under boulders that can be broken with projectiles.”

item.title: Sahayak
item.description: As a part of Mobile Computing course, I managed a group of 10 people and together we developed an android application to connect mentors and mentees to facilitate online learning. This app is called “Sahayak” (सहायक) and uses OpenVidu as the service for online video calling.

item.title: Pommerman
item.description: This was a competition task at NeurIPS 2018 and I thoroughly enjoyed making this project.

item.title: Research Work
item.description: I’ve been involved in expanding my knowledge through research as well. Some works (might be published sometime) are:

item.title: OSS and Community
item.description: Several small open source contributions listed here because I might get back to where I left them off and they are hard to track down from my GitHub profile.

item.title: AI Algorithms
item.description: These are my implementation of some classic AI search algorithms tied to a particular task, with some conclusive experiments. All code is available on github.

item.title: GSoC 2018 @ coala.io
item.description:
coantlib is a library that integrates ANTLRv4 in coala and provides a linting API using parse trees that are generated from the source code.
For GSoC’18 I integrated walkers for two languages - Python and XML.
Detailed work report for GSoC’18 available at -
https://projects.coala.io/GSoC/2018/StatusReport/virresh
Find the project code at : https://gitlab.com/coala/bears/coala-antlr
The project is now in open source domain under coala.
Openhub for this project : https://www.openhub.net/p/coala-antlr
For any queries / support regarding the project, feel free to drop by at https://gitter.im/coala/ast

item.title: Chrome Extension
item.description: This is a chrome extension built for convenience in navigation and utilisation of the intraday charts provided by NSE (National Stock Exchange). It loads symbols in the NIFTY50 dynamically and shows a direct link to open their intraday charts.

item.title: ClubMan
item.description:
This is a club management software, which helps a club to highlight it’s activities, showcase members and their achievements.
It also provides a simple personalised web-page for all the members and a track of which member attended which event.
